attributes.action: Instruct the Boundary Committee for England to open a review into London Borough of Barnet boundary
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We request that you ask the Boundary Committee for England to undertake a review of the southern boundary of the London Borough of Barnet where it meets the London Borough of Camden. 
 
The Inner city fringe community of North Cricklewood has no place in outer London Barnet.
The boundary should be redrawn to accurately reflect the change from inner to outer London.
